author: lzybkr
body:
## Steps to reproduce

ps | Measure-Object -Property PrivateM\* -Sum | select Count,Sum,Property | fl
## Expected behavior

Count    : 156
Sum      : 7671648256
Property : PrivateMemorySize

Count    : 156
Sum      : 7671648256
Property : PrivateMemorySize64
## Actual behavior

Count    : 156
Sum      : 0
Property : PrivateM*
## Environment data

v0.5.0
title: Wildcard properties in measure-object is broken
